entries.journal_entry_description: You have been asked to mark Katiara Orion's final place of rest with a gravestone.
entries.task02_item_name: Katiara's gravestone is now in place
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Bring Katiara Orion's gravestone to the place where she has been laid to rest. It is on the upper level of the station in the central atrium area. Use the gravestone when you drawn near.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Katiara Orion has appeared before you and seems to have something to tell you. Speak with her.
